details: Epilepsy with rush of blood to the head before attack; aura felt in region of heart; flying sensation. Complaints in fat women around climacteric. Chronic malaria. Infantile enlarged liver and spleen. NEPHRITIS, with great sensitiveness in kidney region. Complaints of drunkards after abstaining. (Carbon. sulph.) Fleshy women at climacteric, SLIGHTEST EMOTION CAUSING PALPITATION. Dysphonia, with feeble heart. CHILLINESS. Albuminuria. Dropsy. Affections of spleen and mesenteric glands. Haemoglobin and red corpuscles are low.

Heart: Constriction and pain in region of heart, suffocating feeling, palpitation, oppression and throbbing and pain in back extending to arms
Head: Weekly headache
Pain in head better by lying on painful side
Benumbing headache mostly around ears
Violent rush of blood to head with vertigo
Stomach: Enlarged liver and spleen in children
Belching with saliva and beating of heart
Pancreatic disease; relieves burning pain in cancer of pancreas
Back: Pain and stiffness near nape of neck
Violent back ache, throbbing, drives out of bed
Female: Cancer of uterus; burning pain in uterus and vagina
Extremities: Weariness and lameness of lower limbs
Removes inflammatory products in veins of lower extremities

name: Calcarea arsenica
